c_cpp.taskDefinitions.sources.descriptio: The source files to be compiled, supports glob syntax.
c_cpp.taskDefinitions.compilerPath.descr: C/C++ compiler file path, default: g++.
c_cpp.taskDefinitions.compilerArgs.descr: The parameters to be passed to the compiler, default: -g
c_cpp.taskDefinitions.includePath.descri: Additional include directories, will find header files in it, support glob syntax.
c_cpp.taskDefinitions.libraryPath.descri: Additional library directories, will find library files in it, support glob syntax.
c_cpp.taskDefinitions.options.cwd.descri: The current working directory of the compiler. If omitted, the current workspace root of the code is used.
c_cpp.taskDefinitions.options.env.descri: The shell environment of the compiler. If omitted, the environment of the parent process is used.
